availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Hagerty (Campbell County, Kentucky, sgt 8th KY cav, captain 53rd Mt Inf (U.S.A.))

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, soldier. Mason County, Kentucky, native. Married to Lizzie Merchant Hagerty in Campbell County on September 11, 1864. Served in the 8th Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A.) as sergeant from September 13, 1862, to September 23, 1863. Served in the 53rd Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry (U.S.A). as captain from September 23, 1864, to September 15, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Campbell County Marriages, Film #000465411, p. 416.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 524.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0090.
